name: Pollen Puff
desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

flavorText.sv: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
